choices.B: You must define one or more Global secondary indexes on that table
choices.A: You must define one or more Local secondary indexes on that table
choices.D: You must define one or more secondary indexes on that table
choices.C: You can optionally define one or more secondary indexes on that table

questions.question_text: In regard to DynamoDB, when you create a table with a hash-and-range key.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. You can optionally define one or more secondary indexes on that table
C. You can optionally define one or more secondary indexes on that table

Amazon DynamoDB provides fast access to items in a table by specifying primary key values. However, many applications might benefit from having one or more secondary (or alternate) keys available, to allow efficient access to data with attributes other than the primary key. To address this, you can create one or more secondary indexes on a table and issue Query or Scan requests against these indexes.

Answer: C
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazondynamodb/latest/developerguide/SecondaryIndexes.html

questions.answer_description:
When you create a table with a hash-and-range key, you can optionally define one or more secondary indexes on that table. A secondary index lets you query the data in the table using an alternate key, in addition to queries against the primary key.
Reference:
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazondynamodb/latest/developerguide/DataModel.html

questions.question_text:
Someone has recommended a new client to you and you know he is into online gaming and you are almost certain he will want to set up an online gaming site which will require a database service that provides fast and predictable performance with seamless scalability.
Which of the following AWS databases would be best suited to an online gaming site?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
always think to DynamoDB when it mention game

Selected Answer: B
This one is to easy to a SAP level exam

Selected Answer: B
Amazon DynamoDB is more scalable, globally available and performant for requirements such as online gaming websites.

Answer is B

https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/database/amazon-dynamodb-gaming-use-cases-and-design-patterns/
Answer is B

B is correct.
DynamoDB scales seemlessly with no down time.
Why are they good match?

choices.B: a read request immediately after a write operation shows the latest change.
choices.D: a read request immediately after a write operation might cause data loss.
choices.C: a write request immediately after a read operation might cause data loss.
choices.A: a read request immediately after a write operation might not show the latest change.

questions.question_text: In DynamoDB, "The data is eventually consistent" means that__________.
questions.answer_description:
In DynamoDB, it takes time for the update to propagate to all copies. The data is eventually consistent, meaning that a read request immediately after a write operation might not show the latest change.
Reference:
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazondynamodb/latest/developerguide/APISummary.html

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Answer is A
A. a read request immediately after a write operation might not show the latest change.
this is not a SAP question it is a developer associate question!

Answer is A:

https://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazondynamodb/latest/developerguide/HowItWorks.ReadConsistency.html
Answer is A
A is correct.
How long does it take to guarantee it.

questions.question_text: ____________pricing offers significant savings over the normal price of DynamoDB provisioned throughput capacity.
questions.answer_description:
Reserved Capacity pricing offers significant savings over the normal price of DynamoDB provisioned throughput capacity. When you buy Reserved Capacity, you pay a one-time upfront fee and commit to paying for a minimum usage level, at the hourly rates indicated above, for the duration of the Reserved Capacity term.
Reference:
http://aws.amazon.com/dynamodb/pricing/

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
https://aws.amazon.com/dynamodb/reserved-capacity/#:~:text=Reserved%20capacity%20payment,for%20a%20three%2Dyear%20term.
Seems very old question... no more pricing model this kind.

questions.question_text: In DynamoDB, which of the following operations is not possible by the console?
questions.answer_description:
By using the console to manage DynamoDB, you can perform the following: adding an item, deleting an item, updating an item, and copying an item.
Reference:
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazondynamodb/latest/developerguide/AddUpdateDeleteItems.html

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Blocking an item
